tactic: induction ptd as [| h s IH].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros ptd H_pointed_subdiv. unfold SF_sorted. induction ptd as [| h s IH]. - simpl. auto. - apply SF_cons_ind. + apply ptd_cons in H_pointed_subdiv. apply IH. auto. + intros. apply IH. apply ptd_cons with (h:=h) in H_pointed_subdiv. auto.
